# Common Area, Fancy
## Overview
**Size:** 1 ss

**Cost:** 3,000 gp

**Prerequisites:** None

This room features polished stone or wood floors with comfortable benches. The walls bear impressive murals and sound-dampening curtains. It might serve as a waiting room, a general meeting area, or an all-purpose room.

Purchase this component multiple times if you want a larger common area.
